name: Anna
description: “Pema was excellent. 15 minutes early. friendly and completed a luxury hotel standard clean. Will book again”

name: Paula
description: “Michael was very nice and provided a very efficient service. Highly recommend”

name: Isma
description: “Edmee was great. She was punctual and did a very thorough job. She was also lovely. I was happy with the cleaning.”

name: Lars
description: “Far quick and experienced then I thought as per age. No fancy stuff just chipped in and know each detail whats doing. Have just Blind faith on him and he dont let you down.”

name: Maria
description: “On time and accurama. Clean work. Rahul is cooperative and polite. Will be happy to have them again for next service.”

name: Marta
description: “Albert was very polite and willing to work. Very pleasant.”

name: Gemma
description: “Very professional and thorough! A great clean, thank you Stacey!”

name: Peter
description: “Carla did a fantastic job cleaning our place and was very easy to communicate with”

name: Natascha
description: “Rufa is as amazing as her reviews. Very thorough job, takes the time to get into the details. Will be booking again.”

name: Jamie
description: Fabiene did a fantastic job, the place was spotless.

name: Sanes
description: “Thanks for a great job today Josiah!”

name: Lukas
description: “Hotel style cleaning. Beyond perfection. Will definitely hope he accepts future bookings.”

name: Sanches
description: “Aurora is amazing! We were very happy with the service. She was very considerate and thorough with the amount of time scheduled!”
